sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Sidebar from './sidebar'; class Dasha extends Component { render() { let publicUrl = process.env.PUBLIC_URL + '/' let imagealt = 'image' return (

  • 28 March 2025

Dasha System

üï∞Ô∏è Dasha System in Vedic Astrology

‡Æ§‡Æö‡Øà (Dasha) means "Period" or "Phase" ‚Äî it reveals when events unfold in your life like marriage, career success, or health challenges.

üåü Vimshottari Dasha (‡Æµ‡Æø‡ÆÆ‡Øç‡Æö‡Øã‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡Æ∞‡Æø ‡Æ§‡Æö‡Øà)

The most widely used system in Parashara Jyotish. Total cycle = 120 years. Each planet rules for a fixed number of years.

Planet Tamil Name Years
‚òÄÔ∏è Sun ‡Æö‡ØÇ‡Æ∞‡Æø‡ÆØ‡Æ©‡Øç 6
üåô Moon ‡Æö‡Æ®‡Øç‡Æ§‡Æø‡Æ∞‡Æ©‡Øç 10
‚ôÇÔ∏è Mars ‡Æö‡ØÜ‡Æµ‡Øç‡Æµ‡Ææ‡ÆØ‡Øç 7
‚òøÔ∏è Mercury ‡Æ™‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Æ©‡Øç 17
‚ôÉ Jupiter ‡Æï‡ØÅ‡Æ∞‡ØÅ 16
‚ôÄÔ∏è Venus ‡Æö‡ØÅ‡Æï‡Øç‡Æ∞‡Æ©‡Øç 20
‚ôÑ Saturn ‡Æö‡Æ©‡Æø 19
‚òä Rahu ‡Æ∞‡Ææ‡Æï‡ØÅ 18
‚òã Ketu ‡Æï‡Øá‡Æ§‡ØÅ 7

üîÑ How Vimshottari Dasha is Calculated

  • Based on your Nakshatra (‡Æú‡Æ©‡Æ© ‡Æ®‡Æü‡Øç‡Æö‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡Æø‡Æ∞‡ÆÆ‡Øç) and Moon‚Äôs degree at birth.
  • Ruler of your birth star = first Dasha lord.
  • The remaining years in the Dasha depend on how much of the Nakshatra is left.
  • Example: Born in Rohini ‚Üí Moon rules ‚Üí You begin life with Moon Dasha.

üìä Antar Dasha & Pratyantar Dasha

Each Mahadasha (main period) is subdivided into:

  • Antar Dasha ‚Äì sub-period
  • Pratyantar Dasha ‚Äì sub-sub period

This creates highly accurate timelines ‚Äî down to months and days!

üß† How to Interpret Dasha Results

StepWhat to Check
1Ô∏è‚É£Planet‚Äôs nature (benefic or malefic)
2Ô∏è‚É£Strength (exalted, combust, retrograde)
3Ô∏è‚É£House ownership
4Ô∏è‚É£House placement
5Ô∏è‚É£Aspects and conjunctions
6Ô∏è‚É£Yogas and planetary combinations
7Ô∏è‚É£Position in Divisional Charts (D9, D10)

üßò‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Spiritual Insight

‚ÄúPlanets don‚Äôt just give results ‚Äî they awaken karma during their Dasha.‚Äù

üîÆ Examples:

  • Venus Dasha: Brings love, marriage, art, luxury ‚Äî if Venus is strong.
  • Saturn Dasha: Hard work, discipline, spiritual tests, delays.
  • Rahu Dasha: Sudden changes, obsession, foreign travel, illusion.
  • Jupiter Dasha: Expansion, education, marriage, dharma-based gains.
) } } export default Dasha;
